required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase IIa. Open-label, Multicenter, Dose-escalation Study to Assess the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of ZD4054 (Zibotentan) Given Orally Once Daily in Subjects With Metastatic Prostate Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the safest dose of ZD4054 (Zibotentan)in men with prostate cancer

primary_outcome.description: DLT is defined as experiencing Common Toxicity Criteria (CTC) grade 3 or 4 headache with onset within 24 h of receiving ZD4054, CTC grade 2 rhinitis leading to the withdrawal of the subject, or other CTC grade 3 or 4 toxicity that was considered to be related to ZD4054 treatment. The numbers of patients with a DLT are reported.

secondary_outcome.description: Total Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) concentration at Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Total Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage change in total Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) (ng/mL) from baseline to Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2). Percentage change = [(measure at Day 15 - measure at baseline)/measure at baseline]*100

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Serum Concentration of Bone Alkaline Phosphatase (ALP)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage change in serum concentration of Bone Alkaline Phosphatase (ALP) (ng/mL) from baseline to Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2). Percentage change = [(measure at Day 15 - measure at baseline)/measure at baseline]*100

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Serum Concentration of Procollagen Type I N Propeptide (PINP)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage change in serum concentration of Procollagen Type I N Propeptide (PINP) (ng/mL) from baseline to Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2). Percentage change = [(measure at Day 15 - measure at baseline)/measure at baseline]*100

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Serum Concentration of C-Terminal Telopeptide of Type I Collagen (CTx)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage change in serum concentration of C-Terminal Telopeptide of Type I Collagen (CTx) (ng/mL) from baseline to Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2). Percentage change = [(measure at Day 15 - measure at baseline)/measure at baseline]*100

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Urine Concentration of Type I Collagen-Cross Linked N Telopeptide (NTx)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage change in urine concentration of Type I Collagen-Cross Linked N Telopeptide (NTx) (nmol BCE/mmol Creatinine) from baseline to Day 15 (14 doses of study treatment per patient - no dose was administered on Day 2). Percentage change = [(measure at Day 15 - measure at baseline)/measure at baseline]*100

arm_group.description: 1 x 10 mg oral tablets once daily
1 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily
2 x 10 mg + 1 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily

intervention.description: 1 x 10 mg oral tablets once daily
1 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily
2 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men 18 years & older
- Confirmed diagnosis of prostate cancer with bone metastases
Exclusion Criteria:
- No more than 2 prior chemotherapy regimens
- No radiation, chemotherapy or bisphosphonates in the past 4 weeks

participant_flow.recruitment_details: 22 male patients with metastatic prostate cancer and rising Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) levels were recruited from 11th June 2003 (last subject completed on 31st October 2005). This study was conducted in 2 centres in the United States.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: 6 of the 22 screened patients were not entered into the study as they did not fulfill the study eligibility criteria.

group.description: ZD4054 10 mg dose: 1 x 10 mg oral tablet once daily

group.description: ZD4054 15 mg dose: 1 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily

group.title: ZD4054 22.5 mg
group.description: ZD4054 22.5 mg dose: 2 x 10 mg + 1 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily

participants_list.participants: Dose level given only after lower dose was successfully administered.
Dose level given only after lower dose was successfully administered.
Period 2 - attend Pts who,in the opinion of the Investigator,show benefit from treatment with ZD4054
2 pts discontinued after completion of Period1,therefore 9 pts proceeded to participate in Period2

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: One patient received one dose of 22.5 mg and was dose reduced to 15 mg thereafter. This patient was classified into the 15 mg dose group, except for the single dose pharmacokinetic results (not posted).
